  • |JSP
  • |Export tag
  • Latest release: 0.9.0

Export tag

Usage

Configures a type of export, e.g. allowing to apply CSS on export links.

<datatables:table>
   ...
   <datatables:export type="pdf" cssClass="btn btn-info" />
   <datatables:export type="xls" cssClass="btn btn-success" />
   ...
</datatables:table>

Note that to configure an export, first it must be activated using the export table attribute.

Reference

Name Description Value(s) Default value Data source compatibility
type (required) Type of export to configure csv | xml | pdf | xls | xlsx DOM AJAX
label Label of the HTML link DOM AJAX
cssStyle CSS style applied to the export link(s) DOM AJAX
cssClass CSS class applied to the export link(s) DOM AJAX
includeHeader Indicates whether headers should be added in export or not (only for compatible export : CSV, XLS) true|false true DOM AJAX
fileName Name of the file containing exported data The export type uppercased DOM AJAX
autoSize Indicates whether columns should be auto-sized or not (only for compatible export : XLS) (See the reference) true|false false DOM AJAX
url Custom export URL that will be called using a HTTP GET when clicking on the associated link(s) DOM AJAX
